ARABIC: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِۦ قَوْمُكَ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ قُل لَّسْتُ عَلَيْكُم بِوَكِيلٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Your people deny it and yet it is the Truth. Say: 'I am not here as your guardian. Every communication has its time, and you will certainly come to know.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This (Book) has been called by your people a falsehood though it is the truth. Say: "I am not a warden over you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Your people have denied it even though it is the Truth. Say: "I am not a guardian over You.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Some of) your people have rejected the Quran, although it is the Truth. Tell them that you are not their guardian
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And your people (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) denied it whereas this is undoubtedly the truth; say, “I am not responsible for you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But your people have denied it (the Qur'an) though it is the truth. Say: "I am not responsible for your affairs."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And your people call it a lie and it is the very truth. Say: I am not placed in charge of you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thy people have cried it lies; yet it is the truth. Say: 'I am not a guardian over you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thy people (O Muhammad) have denied it, though it is the Truth. Say: I am not put in charge of you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Your people have rejected the message We have sent through you, though it is the truth. Say "I am not your keeper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And thy people belie it, while it is certain to befall. Say thou: I am not over you a trustee.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Your people have denied it, though it is the truth. Say, ‘It is not my business to watch over you.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But thy people reject this, though it is the truth. Say: "Not mine is the responsibility for arranging your affairs;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But your people (O Muhammad SAW) have denied it (the Quran) though it is the truth. Say: "I am not responsible for your affairs."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Your nation has belied it (the Koran), although it is the truth. Say: 'I am not a guardian over you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But your people rejected it, though it is the truth. Say, “I am not responsible for you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But your people have denied it while it is the truth. Say, "I am not over you a manager."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:66] Your people have denied it, the Qur’ān. Yet it is the truth. Say, to them: ‘I am not a guardian over you, to requite you. I am only a warner and your affair is left to God — this was [revealed] before the command to fight [the idolaters].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Your people) the Quraysh ((0 Muhammad) have denied it) the Qur'an, (though it) the Qur'an (is the Truth. Say) Muhammad: (I am not put in charge of you) I do not guarantee to take you to Allah as believers.
